title: Suzuki Matt
author: Suzuki Matt
content: You dont see loaded Bitbills for sale often.. Im pretty curious to see where they go. https://scarce.city/collections/physical-bitcoin-hoard

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Wow....Thanks for sharing......one does not see a 1 BTC Bitbills come around often...let alone a 5 BTC Bitbills as well!   Looking forward to watching this auction on these rare Bitbills cards and see what they go for!

comments.author: MrGunner2013
comments.body: What’s the History of that website I’m not too aware of the different collectible crypto websites. Is there more like that one. Someone can visit periodically.

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: Quote from: MrGunner2013 on May 15, 2023, 09:38:54 PMWhat’s the History of that website I’m not too aware of the different collectible crypto websites. Is there more like that one. Someone can visit periodically.Scarce.city and Plebian market https://plebeian.market/  are the only two I know of. Pleb market allows for selling your services as well. Just about anything for bitcoin really using lightning. It's a little glitchy at times but it will get better. The guys running it are awesome. Scarecity is cool too just a little different and more main stream right now. Pleb market is up and coming and getting better and better with time and development. But unless someone else can chime in. Those are the only two I'm aware of at the moment.

comments.author: Iced
comments.body: Quote from: Suzuki Matt on May 15, 2023, 10:39:42 PMQuote from: MrGunner2013 on May 15, 2023, 09:38:54 PMWhat’s the History of that website I’m not too aware of the different collectible crypto websites. Is there more like that one. Someone can visit periodically.Scarce.city and Plebian market https://plebeian.market/  are the only two I know of. Pleb market allows for selling your services as well. Just about anything for bitcoin really using lightning. It's a little glitchy at times but it will get better. The guys running it are awesome. Scarecity is cool too just a little different and more main stream right now. Pleb market is up and coming and getting better and better with time and development. But unless someone else can chime in. Those are the only two I'm aware of at the moment. To add to your list:https://rarible.com/ edit: seems that physical collectibles have been removed? Or was I just dreaming that they we're listings previously.To be on topic, this has been a long time since I have seen one!
